text: The pizza is ok for a good price. I ordered for pickup through the app and when I went to pick up my order, I was told that the store was closed and my order, if it existed, was thrown away. Why was the door open if they were closed? I had ‚Ä¶More

name: Keesha Hargrow
text: In the past the pizza was ok, but tonight it was pretty bad. The bottom of the deep dish pizza I ordered  was extra crispy and nearly inedible. Also, some pieces were burnt and didn't have any sauce on them. This is a constant issue I have had with this location and tonight was probably the worst, definitely not worth $17.

name: Taneisha Wardlow
text: The pizza was fresh and cooked very well. The service was awesome sauce. When my order was ready they walked it out to the lobby to me and had labeled everything so my children didn't have to open every box to find what was theirs.
